titleStmt.title: The couenant betweene God and man plainly declared in laying open the first and smallest pointes of Christian religion.
titleStmt.author: Fotherby, John, d. 1619.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Robinson for Raph Iackson,

notesStmt.note: By I.F. or J.F., whose initials appear in the heading of the dedication.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
